txt.en: You should free Reginard from his bindings.
Reginard has been found. Now it's time to find his belongings.
Return to Reginard's camp-site in the marsh
Reginard's food and pipeweed have been scattered across the ground and ruined
Reginard has asked you to find his pack, which must be somewhere in Lhúngobel.
Talk to Reginard outside of Lhúngobel

'I can get out just fine once you untie me, but you've got to search for my pack! It has my lucky four-leaf clover. As long as I have my clover, everything will be fine.

'The goblins dragged my pack off to who knows where -- though I suspect they didn't take it very far!

'I'll wait for you outside the ruins.'
'Oh, hello. I collected kindling on the way here but erm, I tripped and dropped most of it into the river....'
Lost and Found

Reginard's face falls when he weighs the pack in his hands.

'I suppose the goblins weren't very fond of my things. It's just a few spice containers left....

'Wait. Wh -- where's my lucky clover? I can't go back without it! That clover was a gift from -- from -- '

He takes several deep, shaky breaths to steady himself.

'Not much I can do about this, right? Can't comb the entire place for a single clover. This... this will just be a minor setback in my adventure! Yes, that's it.

'Why don't I cook you a meal back at camp? It's only proper after everything you did! I'll meet you there -- I need to take this walk alone.'
You find Reginard staring morosely at the unlit camp-fire
You have found Reginard back at his camp-site.\n\nYou should talk to him.
Free Reginard from his bindings
You have found Reginard's pack with most of its contents ruined.\n\nYou should retrieve his pack for him.
Find Reginard's pack
Talk to Reginard
Reginard is waiting for you outside of Lhúngobel.\n\nYou should return to him with his pack and what remains of his belongings.
DNT
Retrieve Reginard's pack
Reginard has invited you to meet up with him back at his camp-site.\n\nHis camp-site is in the marsh south of Lhúngobel.
The pack feels unfortunately light
